name: Two Pieces - TriJam197
description:
Split, merge, and switch between two puzzle pieces. 

Tips: Pieces must be combined to finish a level, Hold space to jump higher, You can jump on the head of the other piece

I was trying to stay below three hours so this game isn't as good as it could've been. I had enough time to make the art, but it's not the best. I didn't have time to add music or SFX. I will probably return to this project because I like the concept.

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD / Arrow Keys 
  • Space - Jump 
  • E - Combine or Split Apart
  • Tab - Switch Pieces

Credit:

  • Movement Tutorial

  • Better Player Swapping Mechanic

  • Not sticking to walls but still having friction

  • Used this for Better Jump Detection

  • underscoreLu - everything else

Made in 2:59:56 for TriJam 197
